subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays fired J. P. Ricciardi on Saturday, ending his eight-year tenure as the club’s general manager. Ricciardi, who joined the Blue Jays in 2001, had one year left on his contract.
snippet: The Toronto Blue Jays fired J. P. Ricciardi on Saturday, ending his eight-year tenure as the club’s general manager. Ricciardi, who joined the Blue Jays in 2001, had one year left on his contract.
